ygData.subject: Re: Question about all this new stuff...
ygData.msgSnippet: You are absolutly right those new things you are seeing dropping everywhere are for the Newbie Armor quest that almost every class and every race has now
ygData.messageBody:
You are absolutly right those new things you are seeing dropping
everywhere are for the Newbie Armor quest that almost every class
and every race has now (specially in Qeynos where you couldn't get
an armor quest and Surefall Glade).
The NPC that give instructions on how to make armor and what to
collect are right in your class guild, just remember most newbie
armors are class/race specific..So if you are a Wood Elf Druid
don't expect to make and use the Halfling Drid Armor wich is
HLf/Druid only. Just my 2cp.
------------------
Darkmoth
42nd Enchanter Erudite
Vallon Zek
-------------------


--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., ravens_sorrows <no_reply@y...> wrote:
> Ok so it's been quite a few many months since I was able to play
on
> a regular basis. (How I did it with a regular phone connection
I'll
> never know!) Anyway, now that I am playing I have noticed a LOT of
> new stuff. My lvl 10 (now) Ench was playing in Black Burrow in the
> wee hours this morning and I kept getting Ruined Gnoll Leather
stuff
> (like gloves, wristbands etc...) Someone said that this is for a
> Druid, Ranger quest? If this is does anyone know how it works? I
ask
> czause I have a druid and I'd like to get her some decent stuff
> maybe. Anyway, thanks for the info if you have it. The Raven
